alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 10:54PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Cheyenne County in east central Colorado, Wichita, southern Wallace, southwestern Logan and Greeley Counties in west central Kansas through MIDNIGHT MDT/100 AM CDT/... At 1054 PM MDT/1154 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles south of Weskan to 13 miles south of Towner. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Cheyenne County in east central Colorado, Wichita, southern Wallace, southwestern Logan and Greeley Counties in west central Kansas, including the following locations... Lydia, Marienthal and Selkirk. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
